Hanson Smith

  1. Foster Name: Hanson ("Dutch", Moodey)
  2. Foster Family: Guy and Thetis Moody
  3. Location of Family: Stella, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Auburn, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 6
  7. Date of Birth: 2/22/1908, New York City, NY
  8. Date of Death: 11/21/1993, Lincoln, NE
  9. Gender: male
  10. Spouse Name: Vionetta B. Hill
  11. Source: Nemaha County Herald (Auburn, NE), 15 February 1915; 1920 United States Federal Census; 1930 United States Federal Census; Falls City Journal (Falls City, NE), 22 November 1993.
